title: "The Power of Positive Imagination: Steps to Achieving Visualization"
first_phrase: In this final section, we delve into the transformative power of imagination and how we can use it to our advantage. We explore the two phases of imagination - passive and positive trance - and the importance of not getting stuck in the former. We discuss the concept of the Hermetic Caduceus and how imagination can help us bring our dreams to life. Moreover, we learn how imagination can affect not only ourselves but also those around us, and how energy exercises can further enhance this connection. The text emphasizes the need for patience, practice, and perseverance in developing this skill.

last_phrase: In conclusion, developing strong visualization skills takes time and effort, but the results are worth it. Through this direct technique, you can connect with others and increase your personal influence.
